name: Jigoku Train
storyline:
“Do you want to survive?”

What is life?

What do you want to achieve in life?

What are you willing to do to achieve them?

What will you sacrifice to achieve those goals?

Ling, your average office worker having her usual shifts and living her usual life, woke up on the train one night, finding that she was not going to head to her usual destinations.

Where is she heading, and what can she do in order to head back home? Or is there even any way home?

“Looks like we need to do anything we can to get back.”

“Do you want your memories back?”

What does memories mean to you?

How important are they to you?

Do you need them to know who you are?

Or they don’t define who you are, since you’ve lost them?

Waking up with no memories in the train heading towards an unknown location, Grant is your average amnesiac guy.

Accepting the assistance of an unknown young girl, will it be possible to gain his memory back, or will he uncover something else?

“I will uncover the truth and my memories as well.”
summary:
Waking up to an unfamiliar place, what course of action will you choose?

Play as Ling, your average office worker having her usual shifts and living her usual life, woke up on the train one night, finding that she was not going to head to her usual destinations.

Not only that, you will also play another character! He wakes up with no memories on a train heading towards an unknown location. Grant is your average amnesiac guy.

Where are they heading, and what can they do in order to head back home? Or is there even any way home?
